title: Sinful Pleasures
description: Rye Gonzaga met Gillian Reyes in a dream. They were making love. Then it ended in a puff. Rye was left with frustration. He kept wondering who Gillian was. Until he met her at his Uncle’s mountain house.He heard so many bad things about Gillian. That she was a widow and had a daughter at a young age. That she was mistress to a long line of men. And yet, he was attracted to her.Gillian had been fodder to gossips. Men who thought she was an easy lay made those malicious rumors because she turned them down. She believed she was frigid and she was not interested on having relationships. Until Gillian met Rye…She was very aware of him. When his eyes followed her around, her clothes was gone one by one until her body was naked. For the first time, she was attracted to a man. Unfortunately, Jenny had met Rye first. Gillian didn’t know what to do with her desire for the man destined to be her son-in-law…
author: R.L. Mendoza
